p: K 3LuSi 2O 7: xEu 2+ phosphors with different Eu 2+ content ( x = 0–0.05) were prepared by employing solid-state reactions. The stoichiometric mixtures of K 2CO 3 (A.R.), Lu 2O 3 (99.99%), SiO 2 (A.R.), and Eu 2O 3 (99.99%) were thoroughly grounded and transferred into an alumina crucible. After that, the mixed starting materials were sintered at 1350 °C for 6 h in a forming gas atmosphere (N 2:H 2 = 80:20), and finally quenched to room temperature. As a typical synthesis, 3.8 g raw materials (K 2CO 3, Lu 2O 3, SiO 2, and Eu 2O 3) in the given stoichiometric ratio can produce ~2.3 g products.
